name: Mountain out of a Molehill
description:
[Description as written on the GM48 competition entry page in Oct 2015.]

The peaceful Tambo people are being attacked by explosive-carrying animals! You, the heroic mole, must create mountainous molehills to knock them from the sky! Use the environment as your weapon!

  • Use the Mouse to aim
  • Click to dig up a hill

Try to destroy the enemies without destroying your friends before they can ruin everything!

Thanks for playing!
